course_name: Information Technology: Curriculum Foundations Part A
description: This course is designed to prepare pre-service teachers to teach Information Technology subjects in the junior secondary school. It includes theory and practice of teaching information processing in context of Information Technology development in areas such as computing, control, data management, retrieval, networks and technology, school-based assessment.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
